Name: Contact Function Code
Notes: Code identifying the major duty or responsibility of the person or group named

Name: Communication Number Qualifier
Notes: Code identifying the type of communication number
Remarks:
P0304: If either G61-03 or G61-04 is present, then the other is required
G6103 qualifies G6104.

Name: Communication Number
Notes: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

Name: Contact Inquiry Reference
Notes: Additional reference number or description to clarify a contact number
